text: @narendramodi Sir, when we are looking at corporate sector to contribute  their CSR funds for COVID19 related activities, can we same way look at all religious institutions who are sitting on big treasures to contribute for the same cause? Can we take some clue from movie OMG? https://t.co/1fJlWqHVsI
